solution_line_template: Randy spends {spent_per_month}*{months_per_year}=<<{spent_per_month}*{months_per_year}={spent_per_year}>>{spent_per_year} dollars in a year.
Randy will have {initial_money}-{spent_per_year}=<<{initial_money}-{spent_per_year}={remaining_money}>>{remaining_money} dollars in his piggy bank after a year.
